resources.string: Ever been confused about how to calculate power, energy, or time??? This application can help you calculate power, energy, or time.\nLets try it now!
This is a picture of the power, energy, and time formulas

Power, energy, and wattage calculation apps is an application that can help users to calculate Power, time, or energy based on simple physics formulas 
The following are the procedures for using the application, including: 
1. Select the calculation needs by clicking on the dropdown and selecting one. 
2. Enter 2 value inputs, such as power, energy, or time. 
3. Click the calculate button and the results will appear automatically. 
4. Click the share button if you want to share the calculation results with other apps. 

This application was created to fulfill the task of Assesment 1 class of Programing for Mobile Devices 

Copyright Â© 2025 - 2026 Dini Auliya Fauziah 
All rights reserved

Here are the formulas used by this application to calculate Power, Energy, and Time. 
1. Power Formula 
Energy(Joule) / Time(Second) 

2. Energy Formula 
Power(Watt) * Time(Second) 

3. Time Formula 
Energy(Joule) / Time(Second)
